info.title: Vote for Freshair's 2020/2021 Head of News
info.body: As this position wasn't filled during our AGM, we're electing a candidate at this EGM.

news.title: Head of News
news.body: Read each candidate's manifesto on the facebook group 'Freshair Members' before you vote

finished.title: Thanks for voting - the results will be announced on Facebook in a couple days.
